program: Major in Feminist and Gender Studies
notes: The compulsory addition of a 2nd major or the addition of a minor is required in 2nd year. This addition will impact the number of elective course units. Please consult the Office of Undergraduate Studies.

Fall: FEM1100 | Introduction to Feminist and Gender Studies
Winter: 1 from: PHI1102, PHI1103, PHI1104, or PHI1302

Fall: 1 optional course from list of optional courses
Winter: 1 optional FEM course from list of optional courses

Fall: 2 optional courses at 3000-level from list of optional courses
Winter: 1 optional course at 3000-level from list of optional courses
